description: [基本的な統計量の算出] 平均値、分散などの基本的な統計量の計算ができる
description_en: [Basic Statistics] Basic statistics such as means and variances are calculated.

description: [データの前処理] 欠損値の処理や正規化など、データの前処理ができる
description_en: [Data Preprocessing] Data preprocessing operations such as filling in missing values and normalization are implemented.

description: [基本的な予測器の作成] 最小二乗法を用いてデータの予測モデルを実際に作成することができる
description_en: [Basic Predictor] A sales predictor using the least-squares method is implemented.
